Html: Mark of Defiance, Mark of Conquest and Mark of Vindication are level 62 trinkets available from the faction Field Scouts in Zangarmarsh for PvP Marks.  They have decent base stats (32 damage or 54 AP) and a chance on hit/ranged hit/spell hit to return mana or health.  The mana return proc, at least, makes the trinkets very nice for certain classes/builds.

You can add it yourself.

Tools -> Edit Items -> Add
Get the IDs from wowhead (the caster one is 27922, for example)
